bean.p:headerText: Re-Execute the Third Party Payment Plan

bean.p:label: Please Note
bean.p:messageText:
If any of the original settings for this Payment Billing Plan have changed since
this account was enrolled then the new settings (percentages, schedule of payments, etc.)
will apply upon re-execution of the plan.

bean.p:label: Please Note
bean.p:messageText:
If any of the original settings for this Payment Billing Plan have changed since
this account was enrolled then the new settings (percentages, schedule of payments, etc.)
will apply upon re-execution of the plan.

bean.p:label: Prefix the statement entry with the following

bean.p:value: All transactions immediately upon membership within the plan
On the Effective Date of each transaction
Is not allowed. Users will not be allowed to enroll in the plan after the first payment date has passed.

All plan transactions will have Effective Dates according to the schedule of the plan. Late transactions will be considered past-due immedately upon membership according to the effective dates of the transactions.
Financable transactions will be evenly allocated over the remaining payment dates according to the original plan schedule.
Charges with payment dates prior to the payment plan membership date will be due immediately. Future transactions will be created according to the schedule and amounts set in the plan.
